content: hapi server: we have an eltss fhir server built on hapi that is returning most resources for a patient using hapi server, but are finding that some of the resources created/updated within a transaction bundle are not all being returned through a get using http://198.109.136.30:8080/hapi-fhir-jpaserver/fhir/Patient/patient1/$everything, is there a reason why the Observation, Coverage Resources may not be included in the returned bundle?
The everything bundle that is returned has a paging link to the next page of results. Is it possible that the resources you are expecting are on the second (or subsequent) page?
thank you... that's exactly where we found it.
